name: Puzzled Penguin
description:
Puzzled Penguin is an ice puzzle game inspired by ice puzzles from Pokemon and Zelda. The game also contains our unique take on an endless runner, where the player must navigate through obstacles. The game contains 65 levels and Toboggan Mode, which is randomly generated each time you play.

The game was built for mobile devices, but is fully playable on PC, Mac, Linux.
